scripts.compile: npm run compile:rust && npm run compile:typescript
scripts.compile:typescript: npm run swagger && tsc && cross-os postcompile
scripts.dev: npm run compile && npm run start
scripts.db:start: docker run --name boltz-db --rm -v ~/.boltz/db:/var/lib/postgresql/data -e PGDATA=/var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata -e POSTGRES_DB=boltz -e POSTGRES_USER=boltz -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=boltz -d -p 5432:5432 postgres:14-alpine && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:setup: docker exec boltz-db sh -c "sleep 5 && psql -U boltz -tc \"SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname = 'boltz_test'\" | grep -q 1 || psql -U boltz -c \"CREATE DATABASE boltz_test\""
scripts.docker:solidity:deploy: cd node_modules/boltz-core && cp -R ../@openzeppelin node_modules/ && npm run deploy:solidity
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:regtest && npm run docker:solidity && npm run docker:solidity:deploy && npm run docker:solidity:fund
scripts.docker:cln:hold: docker exec regtest lightning-cli plugin start /root/hold.sh
scripts.docker:cln:mpay: docker exec regtest lightning-cli plugin start /root/mpay.sh
scripts.docker:cln:plugins: npm run docker:cln:hold && npm run docker:cln:mpay
scripts.docker:stop: docker kill regtest && docker rm regtest && docker kill anvil && docker rm anvil
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run docker:start && npm run test:int && npm run docker:stop
scripts.test:nodocker: npm run test:unit && npm run test:int
scripts.python:proto: cd tools && poetry run python -m grpc_tools.protoc -I plugins/hold/protos --python_out=plugins/hold/protos --pyi_out=plugins/hold/protos --grpc_python_out=plugins/hold/protos plugins/hold/protos/hold.proto && poetry run python -m grpc_tools.protoc -I plugins/mpay/protos --python_out=plugins/mpay/protos --pyi_out=plugins/mpay/protos --grpc_python_out=plugins/mpay/protos plugins/mpay/protos/mpay.proto
scripts.python:lint: cd tools && poetry run ruff check . ../docker
scripts.python:format: cd tools && poetry run ruff format . ../docker

postcompile.linux: cp package.json dist && cp -R lib/api/static dist/lib/api/static && cp swagger-spec.json dist/lib/api/static && rsync -am --include '*/' --include '*.js*' --exclude '*' lib/proto/ dist/lib/proto
postcompile.darwin: cp package.json dist && cp -R lib/api/static dist/lib/api/static && cp swagger-spec.json dist/lib/api/static && cp -R lib/proto/ dist/lib/proto/
